}} 'MuchMore' (formerly known as 'MuchMoreMusic') is a Canadian English language
Category A specialty channel owned by Bell Media, based at 299 Queen Street West
in Toronto, Ontario.

MuchMore is devoted to music, music-related programming and pop culture, with
its music programming focusing more on adult contemporary music, classic rock,
and lighter music than its sister station, MuchMusic. Its programming consists
of music videos, films, concerts, reality TV and pop culture shows, including a
number of titles licensed from the American channel VH1.
categories: Television channels and stations established in 1998
